website_summaries.verdict: If volleyball on a sandy beach court is your game, then this inexpensive set will fit the bill nicely. Be sure to bury the anchor disks deeply before adding tension to the lines.
pros: Anchor plates perform well in deeper, firmer sand
cons: Plastic stakes and other supports snap easily

customer_reviews.title: it was dumped in a garbage pail). After spending time getting the net etc ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I am not able to return this because it was inadvertently left behind at our Company outing (translation: it was dumped in a garbage pail). After spending time getting the net etc set up in the sand, we discovered the ball was damaged and would not inflate. Since we were at a clambake at the ocean, at night, there wasn't time to ride to a brick and mortar store to purchase another ball. So our annual beach volleyball game--which is always lots of fun--wasn't held. I wish I could return this item, but on principal--the next best thing is to write a review about the complete lack of quality. It is not worth the time or effort or money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: total crap. We took it out of the box and tried to set it up for over an hour. The stakes at the bottom of the net were not sturdy and snapped in half from the wind (there was no storm or large gusts) the yellow disks did nothing to anchor it down. The smaller stakes attached to the strings were also useless. We had 4 intelligent adults attempting this and tried many different tweaks, including borrowing a sand drill from the umbrella man, to no avail. This was a birthday gift that left the recipient frustrated and disappointed. Possibly the worst item I have ever received from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Didn’t last for just one use
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this zero stars. The stakes did not hold the net in place and constantly had to be adjusted. Even some of the stakes broke while trying to set up. The volleyball was inflated to the correct psi and the ‘leather’ and seems split within a day. We tried to play on the beach but gave up after an hour of having to constantly fix the net. Save your money and buy another product.
customer_reviews.author: TJMac

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well with teenagers
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked that after using this multiple times at the beach it can still be used. Good quality and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashly T.

customer_reviews.title: MISSING LOTS OF PIECES, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Missing a LOT of pieces. An unforgivable amount, all the stakes, the pump, and guidewires were absent. All I had was the poles, net, discs and ball. Decent quality for what I did get, but how do I set up the net and get it to stay up without any of the stakes!?!? Clearly zero quality control at Triumph Sports
customer_reviews.author: christopher esposito

customer_reviews.title: Needs simple improvements.
customer_reviews.text: Go to your local sporting goods store and purchase larger stakes. The hold down stakes that come with this are a joke, they are very small plastic and every time the ball hit the net (even softly) the whole thing fell down,the plastic cups used to hold sand as anchors were broken to pieces when a small child stepped on it.we spent our day at beach constantly putting the net back up.
customer_reviews.author: aliveinthe805@gmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stakes for the poles broke while being hammered in the first time. Haven't used it since
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This worked great but it fell down a lot. Easy to set up and easy to put back up though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Addison

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The volleyball had a hole in it and would not blow up. We had to buy one. The net did not stay up with the weights for the sand. If the ball hit the net, the whole thing fell. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We put this on our sport court. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lawence

customer_reviews.title: WE have used this twice since getting it. Today ...
customer_reviews.text: WE have used this twice since getting it. Today being the second day. The ball has ripped at the seam, and the plastic spikes that hold the poles up snapped the first time. I'm very dissatisfied with the quality for such a pricey item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beach set
customer_reviews.text: I was worry that it would be a cheap item because of the price, but it was a great purchase. We had so much fun with the whole family at the beach and everyone really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this set. Easy install and can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the beach, but take a hammer to drive in stakes, otherwise it WILL fall. After we used a hammer it was awesome
customer_reviews.author: C Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 11 year old to play at the beach with her friends. They are loving it!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie G

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ball did not have ability to put air in it. It did not have the valve
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Cadby

customer_reviews.title: I'd definitely recommend this as a set to be used and taken ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this set to play volleyball on a sandbar, and I was very surprised at how tight it held the net. I'd definitely recommend this as a set to be used and taken down. The ball won't last a long time, but it sends like a bonus that it's included, and it worked well for us. I do wish it came with a few more disc anchors. I may add these myself for extra stability in the sand.
customer_reviews.author: scol

customer_reviews.title: Good net
customer_reviews.text: Solid poles sand weights almost useless decent net for the price a lot of hours at the beach so far with nothing breaking.
customer_reviews.author: D. White

customer_reviews.title: STRING AND STAKES TO SECURE IN THE SAND DID NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: STRING AND STAKES TO SECURE IN THE SAND DID NOT LAST. I HAD TO PURCHASE HEAVIER CORD AND LARGER STAKES. THE NET KEPT FALLING. VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: RONALD MENNA

customer_reviews.title: Everything seems to be in good order. Haven't had a chance to set it ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems to be in good order. Haven't had a chance to set it up completely and play a game with it yet, but the parts look sturdy and there were no missing pieces. It does come in a really thick carrying case which holds everything in really well. Can't wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... a company picnic on the beach and it was awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We used it for a company picnic on the beach and it was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hogue

product_meta.title: Triumph Beach Volleyball Set Includes Net, Poles, Official Size Volleyball, Inflating Pump with Needle, and More
product_meta.description: Test your skills around the net with the Triumph Beach Volleyball Set, sure to provide hours of fun at the beach, camping, or any outdoor event! The set includes all you need to set up a volleyball game in the sand. The 32 ft. x 32 in. net features a scorer and mounts onto two 1.5" diameter three section powder coated steel poles with two pole caps and pole anchors to dig deep in the sand. Four sand anchor plates and four ground stakes with rope are also included to ensure the net stays upright during play: bury the anchor plates about a foot deep into the sand - the weight of the sand will hold them down and keep your net stable; use the ground stakes to adjust the net so it stands straight. Once the net is up, inflate the official size and weight volleyball using the included inflating pump with needle, and let the game begin! When the fun is done, all parts fit neatly into the included carrying bag with handles for easy transportation and storage.
feature_bullets: Includes all that is needed to set up and play a game of volleyball at the beach, camping, or any outdoor event
32 ft. x 32 in. net with scorer mounts onto two 3 section powder coated steel poles (1.5" diameter) with 2 pole caps
2 pole anchors and 4 anchor plates buried in the sand will keep your net stable at the beach, while 4 ground stakes with rope keep it straight and provide stability in the backyard
1 official size and weight volleyball and inflating pump with needle
All pieces fit nicely into the included carrying bag for easy transportation and storage
